meanings.definition: To control or adjust with a diaphragm.
meanings.sent1: She was diaphragming the camera settings to get the perfect shot.
meanings.sent2: He diaphragmed the airflow in the room by adjusting the vents.
meanings.sent3: The chef diaphragmed the heat on the stove to prevent burning the dish.
meanings.sent4: The pilot diaphragmed the engine speed for a smooth landing.
meanings.sent5: The musician diaphragmed the sound levels for a balanced performance.

meanings.definition: To use a diaphragm as a method of birth control.
meanings.sent1: She is diaphragming to prevent pregnancy.
meanings.sent2: They diaphragm as a contraceptive measure.
meanings.sent3: The couple decided to start diaphragming for family planning.
meanings.sent4: Diaphragming is an effective way to avoid unwanted pregnancies.
meanings.sent5: Many women choose diaphragming as their preferred birth control method.
